caption.title: Calibration between Pléiades and Landsat images.
caption.p: Regression coefficients (red line), slope values (labels on red dots), and root mean-square deviation (RMSE, blue curve) of the linear regressions between wetland areas calculated from Pléiades image and those calculated from Landsat images (N = 33 wetlands at different NDVI threshold values.
Click here for additional data file.
